org.bonitasoft.engine.operation

Interface Operation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface Operation
extends Serializable
    An Operation has a LeftOperand (typically, for assignment operations, left operand is the part of the operation receiving the value), an OperatorType which defines the type of operation to execute and a right operand, represented by an Expression.
    Author:
    Zhang Bole, Emmanuel Duchastenier
    See Also:
    LeftOperand, Expression, OperatorType

    • Method Detail

      • getLeftOperand

        LeftOperand getLeftOperand()
        Returns:
        the LeftOperand of this Operation, representing what entity will be set after execution.

      • getVariableToSet

        @Deprecated
LeftOperand getVariableToSet()
        Deprecated. As of 6.0 replaced by getLeftOperand()

      • getType

        OperatorType getType()
        Returns:
        the operator type of this Operation.

      • getOperator

        String getOperator()
        Returns:
        the operator of this Operation,as a String.

      • getRightOperand

        Expression getRightOperand()
        Returns:
        the right operand Expression to be evaluated before executing the operation
